WorkItem.ClosedComment: The optimization changes are meant to be taken as a whole, you could be losing hit with one item and picking it up with the other, but changing one item over another in a list would both lose its effectiveness and leave a lot of users making poor decisions with the added confusion
WorkItem.Description:
While the visual display of changes is nice and appealing, I think it would be more functional to have an optional itemized list of changes available. Something like:
 
Chest (Yellow) - Runed Cardinal Ruby --> Reckless Ametrine
Chest (Blue) - Runed Cardinal Ruby --> Purified Dreadstone
Chest (Blue) - Runed Cardinal Ruby --> Purified Dreadstone
 
It'd be easier to make optimization changes to your gear this way.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.Optimizer] Itemized List of Optimization Changes

Comments.Message: I like that.  I'd like it a bit more if each change would get scored (what is the impact on my new optimized Score if I take every recommendation except this one?).
